Generated Narrative: CodeSystem SSSFacialParesis

This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/SSSFacialParesis defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
2 Ingen eller tvivlsom parese.
0 Sikker facialisparese

name: SSSFacialParesis
title: Scandinavian Stroke Scale (SSS) - Facial paresis
publisher: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

contact.name: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description: Scandinavian Stroke Scale (SSS) - Facial paresis: Kun en sikker facialisparese giver 0. Hvis man er i tvivl gives 2.
